Entries.reading: Oh, hi, @! I'm just researching and reading more of Mom's journal. I think I might be able to go on an expedition soon!
Entries.dusty: Hi Dusty! Aww, you're a good boy, aren't you?$h#$b#If Alex ever let me, I would bring you toys every day!$h
Entries.beach: I love the beach during the summer! Warm rays, sand in my feet...#$b#What could possibly be more fun?$h
Entries.linus_winter: Linus lets me talk with him by the fire on cold days like today.#$b#He's so nice!$h
Entries.pierre: Hi, Pierre! What kinds of fruit do you have today? I'm looking to make a fresh fruit salad!$h
Entries.emily: Emily's job looks so hard! I'm just here to keep her company on a busy night like tonight.
Entries.silly: Hi, Silly! Do you wanna play?$h
Entries.rain1: I'm just hiding from the rain under this tree. Everything looks so gloomy...$s
Entries.game: Oh, hi @. Do you know how to play this thing?#$b#I'm not a very good gamer, but there's nothing else to do in the rain...$s
Entries.marriage_Marlon: Hi, honey! I'm just visiting Marlon and Gabe today. I want to make sure they're doing okay!
Entries.marriage_Gabriel: I hope Gabe isn't working himself too hard. I can't check up on him as often now that I've moved out...$s
Entries.marriage_reading: Hi, honey! I'm researching some more for Mom's book.#$b#You can stay and helps, if you'd like...$l
Entries.marriage_nightMarket: Hi, honey! They have some cute statues in that stall over there. I think the farm would look perfect with one of those!$h
